Loading packages
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)

```



Importing BACSAL data set
```{r}

library(readr)
bsdata <- read_csv("complete_BACSAL_data.csv", show_col_types = F)
View(Compiled_master_repaired)

```

Creating & converting variables

Root-shoot ratio (the ratio of root dry biomass over shoot dry biomass)
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
bsdata %>% 
  select(`Root Mass (g)`, `Shoot mass (g)`) %>% 
  mutate(rts = `Root Mass (g)` / `Shoot mass (g)`)

```
